item.description:
Hi all,
Martha volunteered to organize another event for Saturday night since there was such a big response for the Happy Hour.

Details from Martha:
Please come to
Applebee's in Brighton
381 Chestnut Hill Ave.Brighton, MA 02135

Limit will be 10 people; Friday at 3:00 is the cut off time to respond. Reservations at 6:00pm.

Applebee's is T accessible by the green D line stop is Reservoir OR C Cleveland Circle stop. There is parking available.

After responding, please also e-mail Martha to confirm that you are coming. Her phone number is 781-883-4362.
Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: Reservations will be made under Martha or Couples Meetup
item.name: Dinner out in Brighton
